column1: Friends may call from 6 to 8 p.m. Thursday at the West Chapel of Bennett Funeral Home
column4: with a 7:30 p.m. Masonic memorial service. A visitation will also be held from 2 to 4 p.m. Friday
column5: with a 4 p.m. funeral service at the funeral home. Graveside services will be held 1 p.m. Saturday in Bethel Lutheran Church Cemetery
